dcterms:description: A dataset created for evaluating machine translation metrics specifically for low-resource Indian languages, including annotations based on Multi-Dimensional Quality Metrics (MQM) and Direct Assessment (DA).
dcterms:title: MQM dataset for low-resource languages

dcterms:description: A multilingual evaluation benchmark designed for low-resource and multilingual machine translation, providing a comprehensive dataset for evaluating translation quality across various languages.
dcterms:title: FLORES-101 dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset used for generating synthetic data to augment the training of machine translation evaluation metrics, specifically for low-resource languages.
dcterms:title: BPCC-seed dataset

dcterms:creator: Ananya Sai B

dcterms:description: A dataset designed to meta-evaluate machine translation metrics specifically for Indian languages, providing a framework for assessing translation quality.
dcterms:title: Indic MT Eval dataset
